xwikidoc.title: Contributions
xwikidoc.content: #** * MyCurriki Contributions Page * *# #** * MyCurriki Contributions Page Content Call Back function * @param $userdoc Document of the user * @param $userobj Object of the user *# #macro(mycurriki_pagecontent $userdoc $userobj) #mycurriki_contributionsbox( $userdoc $userobj ) #end #** * MyCurriki Contributions Page Button Call Back function * @param $userobj Object of the user *# #macro(mycurriki_pagebutton $userobj) ##{ #mycurriki_contributionsbutton($userdoc $userobj) #end ## buttonmacro ##} ## ## Actual Display of page #mycurriki_pagewithbutton("contributions")
